string.text: Branded one be careful - it's said that the village has got another anomaly - it's moving very fast, moreover it's hard to notice it, damn.
Remember about the mines - sapper can be mistaken twice...
If you sit the whole night in the village on the Tower - the something is DEFINITELY going to happen... :)
Branded one, be careful, of you may catch a bullet with your noodle...
Attention to everyone interested - the passage to Radar is guarded by the Monolithian troop, I think that you know that they're shooting off everyone who passes by. Good luck.
Branded one, cope with the stalkers!!!
Our task is fulfilled. Thanks for your help.
